	-==-


Universal Controller Fix (UCF), v0.8.tm
About: http://www.20xx.me/ucf.html

Slightly modified from the original v0.8, for compatibility with Training Mode and 20XX replays, by UnclePunch. Plus wrappers to allow for Debug Menu on/off toggle, by DRGN.

Controlled by debug menu flag @ 0x803FA210
[Dan Salvato, taukhan, UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -
NTSC 1.02 ---- 0x6459C ------ 388023EC -> 388023FC # Playerdata struct size adjustment

Disable Wobbling
Disable Ice Climbers' grab infinite. Opponent breaks out after being hit by Nana 3 times.
Controlled by Debug Menu flag at 0x2254C4 | 802288E4 (added by DRGN).
[UnclePunch]
Revision ---- DOL Offset ---- Hex to Replace ---------- ASM Code -

Missing L-Cancels Fall Through Floor
Uses a slightly different injection point than the original code to make the conditional switch (determined by debug menu flag 802288FC) simpler.
<https://smashboards.com/threads/missed-l-cancels-fall-through-floor.484410/>
[UnclePunch, DRGN]

Disable Dodges
Debug Menu options for both spot dodges and airdodges.

<https://smashboards.com/threads/disable-airdodge.446990/post-21719528>

38600000 4E800020
